1.0.name: wordpress/mantel-lite
1.0.description: A minimal and elegant WordPress theme comes with easy to use theme settings, post format support, 3 custom widgets, sticky posts slider, 3 custom page templates and theme customizer. It has an optional one-column, two columns and full-width column layout.
